Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
WOB CLASHES WITH LYRAN GUARD ON KEID


[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOutreach],Outreach]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFedCom],Federated Commonwealth]]:  In one of the [[DM.Factions[faction_WordOfBlake],Word of Blake's]] most overt moves in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreChaosMarch],Chaos March]] to date, the Word has used the recently signed [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHPG],HPG]] contract with Keid's Duchess Arice Hunsen to consolidate their control over the entire world.  Almost immediately after landing in late 3065, Blakist mercenaries [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCliftonsRangers],Clifton's Rangers]] and [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHannibalsHermits],Hannibal's Hermits]] began clashing with the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLyranGuard],Thirtieth Lyran Guard]], outmaneuvering and ambushing the heavier Lyran unit at every turn.  After months of combat, the Lyran Guard are retreating to their base for a final stand, but are calling for any reinforcements to aid in their defence.

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
FIGHTING ON ELGIN GRINDS ON


[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOutreach],Outreach]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFedCom],Federated Commonwealth]]:  The various Barons with their House Guards and supporting mercenaries continue to squabble amongst themselves for overall control of the planet.  Meanwhile, the remaining pro-[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFedCom],Fedcom]] members of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRepublican],Fifth Republican Guard]] continue to hole up in and around the planet's largest city and spaceport, and all sides have contracts via the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMRBC],MRBC]] to support their operations.  Due to the continuing instability, many believe the world is prime for intervention by either the [[DM.Factions[faction_WordOfBlake],Word of Blake]], the [[DM.Factions[faction_Liao],Capellan Confederation]], or the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAMC],Allied Mercenary Command]].
